subject: for DAna
author: bhali333
full_text:
I was not even going to respond to the post where you basicaly called 
me a fraud, BUT, I don't know how long you have been a member of this 
group or if you even know a thing about box research. Well let me 
rephrase that, If you knew anything about box research you would not 
have made such an ignorant statement.

With out my usual tirade of insults I will simply say , before you post 
a statement like that please do your home work on the researcher and 
the research itself.

Bruce
